name: Tag Zoom meeting registrants according to attendance
description:
The scenario fetches attendance data from Zoom after a meeting ends and calculates the percentage of time each participant stayed compared to the total meeting duration. Based on this, the scenario applies specific tags in KlickTipp:

Attended live full – joined and stayed for at least 90% of the meeting

Attended live – joined and stayed for more than 60% but less than 90% of the meeting

It supports different Zoom meetings and can process multiple participants in one run. This allows you to segment your list and run personalized follow-up sequences based on attendee engagement.

This setup is useful for online events, workshops, and live trainings where you want to track attendance behavior and trigger targeted automation according to participation level.
